document.full_text: a group of creditors led by goldman sachs  and morgan stanley  proposed a restructuring plan for lehman brothers holdings inc that would boost recoveries for the banks and keep separate the assets of lehman's bankrupt subsidiaries.
document.title: goldman and banks offer lehman restructuring plan
lines_and_colors: a group of creditors led by goldman sachs  and morgan stanley  proposed a restructuring plan for lehman brothers holdings inc that would boost recoveries for the banks and keep separate the assets of lehman's bankrupt subsidiaries.
